## Search for Best Configuration

```{r, eval = TRUE}
M1 <- 1
M2 <- 100000
Xsum <- sapply(M1:M2, red_and_black)
names(Xsum) <- M1:M2
```
-->

## Summary 

```{r, echo = TRUE}
Xsum %>%
  summary %>%
  round(2) 
Xsum %>%
  sd %>%
  round(2)
Xsum %>%
  `<=`(2) %>%
  which %>%
  `[`(Xsum, .) %>%
  round(2)
Xmin <- names(Xsum[which(Xsum == min(Xsum))])
Xmin
```

## Plot

```{r, echo = FALSE}
hist(Xsum, prob = TRUE, nclass = 20, xlim = c(0, 50), ylim = c(0, 0.08))
x <- seq(0, 50, by = 0.1)
lines(x, dchisq(x, df = 16), col = "red")
legend("topright", inset = 0.05, legend = c("Xsum", "Chi-square(16)"), col = c("black", "red"), lty = 1)
plot(density(Xsum), xlim = c(0, 50), ylim = c(0, 0.08), main = "Density Estimation of Xsum")
lines(x, dchisq(x, df = 16), col = "red")
legend("topright", inset = 0.05, legend = c("Xsum", "Chi-square(16)"), col = c("black", "red"), lty = 1)
```

## Randomization

```{r, randomization}
set.seed(Xmin)
N <- nrow(class_roll) 
class_roll$group <- 
  sample(1:N) %%
  2 %>%
  factor(levels = c(0, 1), labels = c("Red", "Black"))
red_and_black(Xmin)
```

### 학년

```{r, year, eval = FALSE}
tbl0 <- class_roll$year %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl0 %>%
  pander
X0min <- tbl0 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X0min
```
-->

```{r, id, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}

  substr(1, 4) %>%

tbl1 <- class_roll %$%
  table(.$group, .$id_2) %>%
  `colnames<-`(c("2018 이전", 2019:2024)) 
tbl1 %>%
  pander
```

## e-mail 서비스업체

```{r, e_mail, eval = FALSE}
isp <- class_roll$email %>%
  strsplit("@", fixed = TRUE) %>%
  sapply("[", 2) %>%
  strsplit("[.]", fixed = FALSE) %>%
  sapply("[", 1)
tbl4 <- isp %>%
  `%in%`(c("naver", "gmail")) %>%
  ifelse(isp, "기타서비스") %>%
  factor(levels = c("naver", "gmail", "기타서비스"),
         labels = c("네이버", "구글", "기타서비스")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl4 %>%
  pander
X4min <- tbl4 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = FALSE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X4min
```

## 전화번호의 분포

```{r, cell_no, eval = FALSE}
cut_label <- paste(paste0(0:9, "000"), paste0(0:9, "999"), 
                   sep = "~")
tbl5 <- class_roll$cell_no %>%
  substr(start = 8, stop = 11) %>%
  sapply(as.numeric) %>%
  cut(labels = cut_label, 
      breaks = seq(0, 10000, by = 1000)) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl5 %>%
  pander
X5min <- tbl5 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X5min
```

## 성씨 분포

```{r, name, eval = FALSE}
f_name <- class_roll$name %>%
  substring(first = 1, last = 1) 
tbl6 <- f_name %>%
  `%in%`(c("김", "이", "박", "최", "정")) %>%
  ifelse(f_name, "기타") %>%
  factor(levels = c("김", "이", "박", "최", "정", "기타")) %>%
  table(class_roll$group, .) 
tbl6 %>%
  pander
X6min <- tbl6 %>%
  chisq.test(simulate.p.value = TRUE) %>%
  `[[`(1)
X6min
```
